title: rE maanasa chintayE
sahitya:
rE mAnasa cintayE shrI rAmam

caraNam 1

 sAkEta nagara nAthuni samAna rahita mAvaruni
   
caraNam 2

 gata kAma jana hrdayArNava kalAdharuni ilAdhipuni
   
caraNam 3

 bhaktAkha payOdhara prabhanjanuni niranjanuni
   
caraNam 4

 vinatA tanayArtitamO vibhAkaruni shubhAkaruni
   
caraNam 5

 dEvEsha samArAdhayuni digambaruni cidambaruni
   
caraNam 6

 vandAru brndAraka varAbhayatuni rAghavuni
   
caraNam 7

 vara tyAgarAjArcita padAmbujuni sadA hituni
